# FR Coverage Map

| Epic | FRs Covered | Description |
|------|-------------|-------------|
| **Epic 1** | FR-001, FR-002, FR-003, FR-004, FR-021 | MCP protocol, semantic search, operation execution |
| **Epic 2** | FR-006, FR-007 | Connection management and auto-reconnection |
| **Epic 3** | FR-008, FR-009, FR-010, FR-023 | Topology operations with safety validations |
| **Epic 4** | FR-005, FR-011, FR-012, FR-013 | AMQP messaging operations |
| **Epic 5** | FR-022 | Console client CLI interface |
| **Epic 6** | FR-018 | Comprehensive testing framework |
| **Epic 7** | FR-014, FR-015, FR-016, FR-017, FR-019, FR-020 | Logging, observability, security |
| **Epic 8** | N/A (Documentation) | MVP documentation and release preparation |
